author: Guest
title: $1.5 Million in NFL Contest Prizes - 2025
text:
$1.5 Million in NFL Contest Prizes - 2025
This is it! We been waiting for several months for football season where we start moving our pieces and going the extra mile to bring in those players and grow your profits!
$1 Million NFL Score Predictor - Live Now!
Never been easier to earn a juicy chunk of money! Contest is Free!
How to Play:
Submit your score predictions for each of the 3 games listed.
The $1 Million prize is awarded to the player(s) that can correctly predict the correct score for each of the three games.
Contest close on Sunday, September 8th, 2024 at 4:25 pm ET.
Winner-Take-All $300,000 NFL Survivor! - Live Now!
The first entry into the contest is only $30 and players can purchase up to 25 total entries for the contest at discounted rates. The contest has an accumulating cash prize pool; therefore, if the total entry fees surpass $300k the prize pool will grow higher. Entries can be purchased up until kickoff of the Monday night game of NFL Week 1 on Monday, September 9th at 8:15 pm ET. Players can only select a team once throughout the NFL regular season.
$200,000 NFL MegaContest â€“ Live Now!
This contest is free to enter for everyone. However, players who have deposited $25 or more in Cryptocurrency will be granted a 2nd entry. Players must select 5 spreads each week of the NFL season. The $150,000 will be split up equally within the 18 weeks of the NFL regular season to the players who pick 5 spreads correctly each week. The weekly prizes will be awarded in Free Bets (BOL) and Free Play (SB). There will also be a $50,000 cash prize pool that will go to the overall winners from our season-long leaderboard. First-place will win $10,000 in cash, and the top 100 players will also win cash. This contest closes on Sunday, January 5th, 2025 at 4:25 pm (ET).
Take advantage of these incredible contest and many more to come by sharing with your members!
